welcomeMessage.welcomeMessage_No2: * $ This is a program practice platform
welcomeMessage.welcomeMessage_No3: * $ You can put download QuestionFile in <QuestionData> folder
welcomeMessage.welcomeMessage_No5: * $ Then you can try to write programs
welcomeMessage.welcomeMessage_No6: * $ If you don’t know how to do the question
welcomeMessage.welcomeMessage_No7: * $ You can enter <^HELP> in the answer to show prompt
welcomeMessage.welcomeMessage_No8: * $ If you don’t know how to use LitsQuestions-
welcomeMessage.welcomeMessage_No9: * $ -you can enter this string of commands <LitsQuestions ^HELP use> in console

questionFileTips.questionFileErrorMessage_No2: * $ Please check QuestionFile is in <QuestionData> folder
